UpgradeableCustomProxy._implementation().impl (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.12/6b./ethereum/contracts/mainnet/6b/6BE937Ee9ce904912F85095dA95440373c7F8346_StakingRewardsFactoryV2.sol/6BE937Ee9ce904912F85095dA95440373c7F8346_StakingRewardsFactoryV2.sol#996) gets value from a cross-contract call: ImplementationGetter(storage_address).getImplementationAddress()

Missing compatibility check in Proxy.fallback()
